item.description:
Saturday, August 23, 2008
RAIN OR SHINE
Noon - 7pm (Gate opens at 11:30pm)

Live Music - TOP BLUES BANDS
11:00 to 12:00 Racky Thomas
12:45 Ottomatic Slim
1:50 Jason James and the Bay State Houserockers
2:55 Bruce Marshall Group
4:05 The Love Dogs
5:30 Ronnie Earl and the Broadcasters

Dozens of Regional Craft Breweries, PLUS a special booth featuring cask-conditioned ale
GREAT Food, such as BBQ, grilled chicken, hotdogs/hamburgers, Oktoberfest food, snacks and ice cream!
Homebrew Competition awards
Collectible quality program book featuring bands & breweries
Raffles, Games, Homebrew Demonstrations, Craft & Vendor Booths, more!

Blues 'N' Brews is a project of the Westford Rotary Charitable Endowment, Inc. Beneficiaries of the funds raised from this year's festival include the Multiple Sclerosis Society (Blister Buddies), Merrimack Valley Food Bank, Ronan McElligott Memorial Playground, Massachusetts National Guard Family Support Fund, Friends Forever International Peace Program, and various scholarships and projects supported by Westford Rotary Club.

Cost:
$30 in advance
$35 at the door*

Kids under 12 free (must be accompanied by adult). Paid admission includes ten beer tastings, or equivalent in non-alcoholic beverages for those not of legal drinking age. Click Here to get tickets. (*walk-in admission is subject to availability)

PLEASE NOTE:
No Pets
No Coolers
No Readmission
Please take time to read the complete Rules & Regulations.
http://www.bluesnbrew...

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Blues 'N' Brews
